title: Execute each of the 65+ simulated functions
description: Verify that each simulated function executes correctly and produces realistic, varied data on each execution across all 12 categories.

steps.description: Open the functions catalog.
Sequentially select each of the 65+ function cards.
Execute the selected function.
Verify that the simulation modal appears with realistic and varied data output.
Repeat execution multiple times for selected functions.
Verify that data output differs appropriately on each execution to reflect dynamic simulation.

title: Voice command recognition and execution
description: Verify the voice access system accurately recognizes and processes all 30+ predefined voice commands, including help commands and error handling.

steps.description: Click the microphone icon to start voice input.
Speak each of the 30+ predefined commands clearly.
Verify the system executes the correct navigation or function action for each command.
Speak an unsupported or gibberish command.
Verify the system provides appropriate error messages and text-to-speech feedback indicating unrecognized command.
Deny microphone permission and attempt voice commands.
Verify proper error handling and user notification for permission denial.

title: Keyboard shortcut default behaviors
description: Verify the default set of global keyboard shortcuts perform their assigned actions such as navigation, toggling voice or theme, opening automation builder, and closing modals.

steps.description: Trigger each available default keyboard shortcut.
Verify that each shortcut performs the expected function immediately and globally.
Open modals, toggle themes, activate voice input using shortcuts.
Verify UI updates and system states reflect the shortcut actions.

title: Custom keyboard shortcuts editing and conflict prevention
description: Verify users can customize all keyboard shortcuts, that conflicts are detected and prevented, and that changes apply immediately with option to reset to defaults.

steps.description: Open the shortcut editor.
Attempt to assign a new valid shortcut for a specific action.
Verify the new shortcut binding is saved and takes effect immediately.
Attempt to assign a shortcut that conflicts with an existing shortcut.
Verify the conflict is detected, user is notified, and assignment is rejected.
Use the reset option to restore all shortcuts to default.
Verify all shortcuts revert to their original default bindings.

title: Fuzzy search functionality and keyboard navigation
description: Verify the search modal returns correct fuzzy matches instantly for keywords, supports keyboard navigation (arrow keys), and allows execution of functions from results.

steps.description: Open the search modal using keyboard shortcut.
Type various keywords with possible typos.
Verify the search results update instantly and include correct fuzzy matches.
Navigate through search results using keyboard arrows.
Verify the focus moves correctly among the results.
Execute a function using the Enter key on a selected result.
Verify the selected function executes and shows its simulation modal.

title: Favorites system add, persist, and access
description: Verify users can add functions to favorites, favorites persist in localStorage across sessions, and favorites modal and indicators reflect accurate data.

steps.description: Select several functions from the catalog and add them to favorites.
Verify that UI indicators mark these functions as favorite.
Reload the application.
Verify favorites persist and are accessible via the dedicated header button.
Open favorites modal and execute functions from it.
Verify functions execute correctly from favorites modal.

title: Theme manager's Dark, Light, and Auto modes
description: Verify theme switching between Dark, Light, and Auto modes with smooth transitions, persistence across sessions, and keyboard shortcut control.

steps.description: Change theme from settings to Dark mode.
Verify UI switches to Dark theme with smooth animations.
Change theme to Light mode.
Verify UI switches to Light theme smoothly.
Change theme to Auto mode.
Verify UI theme changes automatically following system preferences.
Reload the app.
Verify the previously selected theme mode persists.
Use keyboard shortcut to toggle theme.
Verify theme toggles accordingly.

title: Export and import backup data validation and restoration
description: Verify the backup export produces a valid JSON containing automations, favorites, and settings, and that import restores data correctly after validation with UI feedback.

steps.description: Create a set of favorites and automations, customize settings.
Use export functionality to save backup JSON.
Verify exported JSON contains complete and valid data matching current app state.
Clear favorites, automations, and reset settings.
Use import functionality to load backup JSON.
Verify data imports correctly, UI updates, and user receives confirmation feedback.
Attempt to import corrupted or invalid JSON.
Verify validation rejects import, notifies user with error message, and prevents data corruption.

title: Performance monitor analytics accuracy and responsiveness
description: Verify real-time analytics such as function executions, search counts, voice commands, favorites usage, theme changes, memory usage, and session duration are accurate and update smoothly without impacting app performance.

steps.description: Perform multiple function executions, searches, voice commands, toggle themes and favorites.
Open performance monitor dashboard.
Verify all tracked metrics accurately reflect user interactions.
Verify dashboard updates in real-time with no lag or UI performance degradation.

title: Recent functions history tracking and re-execution
description: Verify the app tracks last 10 executed functions with usage counts and timestamps, allows quick re-execution from history, and supports clearing history.

steps.description: Execute more than 10 different functions consecutively.
Verify recent functions history lists only last 10 with accurate usage counts and time indicators.
Re-execute a function via quick re-execution controls in history panel.
Verify function executes correctly and usage count updates.
Use clear history functionality.
Verify history list clears from UI and storage.

title: Real device monitoring panel live data display
description: Verify real-time monitoring panel displays accurate battery status, network type and speed, online/offline status, and live clock, updating live during changes.

steps.description: Open the real device monitoring panel.
Verify displayed battery level and charging status match device API data.
Verify displayed network type and speed match current network conditions.
Verify online/offline status updates correctly when connection is toggled.
Verify the live clock updates accurately every second.

title: Automation builder workflow creation, execution, and multi-trigger/action chaining
description: Verify the drag-and-drop automation builder supports creating workflows using pre-built templates, chaining multiple triggers and actions, saving, and executing workflows correctly.

steps.description: Open the automation builder.
Create a new automation workflow using drag-and-drop interface, including multiple triggers and chained actions.
Use a pre-built template to create a workflow.
Save the workflow.
Trigger the workflow manually or via defined triggers.
Verify each action in the chain executes in sequence and workflows run without errors.
Modify and delete workflows.
Verify workflows update correctly and remove as expected.

title: Offline PWA support caching, installability, and functionality
description: Verify the service worker properly caches resources, the app is installable as PWA, and full app functionality works without internet connectivity.

steps.description: Open the app online and inspect service worker registration.
Verify necessary resources are cached successfully by the service worker.
Use browser UI to install the app as Progressive Web App.
Verify the app installs and launches as standalone PWA.
Go offline (disable network).
Launch the PWA and use major features including function execution, favorites, automation builder, and settings.
Verify the app functions fully with no errors or degraded experience while offline.

title: No critical errors or console warnings on supported browsers
description: Verify that during normal operation across supported browsers (Chrome, Edge, Safari, Firefox), no critical JavaScript errors or console warnings appear.

steps.description: Open the app using each supported browser.
Perform typical user operations including navigating, executing functions, searching, using shortcuts, toggling themes, and creating automations.
Monitor browser developer console logs.
Verify no critical errors or warnings are logged in the console.
